#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 10010;
struct node {
	int height;
	char name[10];
}person[maxn];
bool cmp(node a, node b) {
	if (a.height != b.height) return a.height > b.height;
	else return strcmp(a.name, b.name) < 0;
}
int main() {
	int n, k, cnt = 0;
	cin >> n >> k;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin >> person[i].name;
		cin >> person[i].height;
	}
	int rownum = n / k;
	sort(person, person + n, cmp);
	for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
		vector<node> ans(n+1);
		int num;
		if (i == 0)  num = n - (rownum * (k - 1));
		else  num = rownum;
		ans[num / 2 + 1] = person[cnt++];
		for (int j = 1; j <= num / 2; j++) {
			if ((num / 2 + 1 - j) >= 1) ans[num / 2 + 1 - j] = person[cnt++];
			if ((num / 2 + 1 + j) <= num) ans[num / 2 + 1 + j] = person[cnt++];
		}
		for (int j = 1; j <= num; j++) {
			cout << ans[j].name;
			if (j < num) cout << " ";
		}
		cout << endl;
		ans.clear();
	}
	return 0;
}

int main(){
	bool surenobroken[256]={false},hasprint[256]={false};
	map<char,bool> broken;
	vector<char> needprint;
	string s;
	int k;
	scanf("%d",&k);
	cin>>s;
	int cnt=1;
	char pre='@';
	s=s+'@';
	for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
		if(s[i]==pre){
			cnt++;
		}else{
			if(cnt%k!=0) surenobroken[pre]=true;
			cnt=1;
		}
		if(i<s.size()-1) broken[s[i]]=(cnt%k==0);
		pre=s[i];
	}
	for(int i=0;i<s.size()-1;i++){
		if(surenobroken[s[i]]==true) broken[s[i]]=false;
		if(broken[s[i]]==true&&hasprint[s[i]]==false){
			needprint.push_back(s[i]);
			hasprint[s[i]]=true;
		}
	}
	for(int i=0;i<needprint.size();i++) cout<<needprint[i];
	cout<<endl;
    for(int i=0;i<s.length()-1;i++){
    	cout<<s[i];
    	if(broken[s[i]]==true) i=i+k-1;
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct node1 {
	int id, fid, mid,  num, area;
	int cid[10];
}person[100000];
struct node2 {
	int id, members = 0;
	double num = 0, area = 0;
	bool flag = false;
}ans[100000];
bool vis[100000] = { false };
int father[100000];
int findfather(int v) {
	while (v != father[v])
		v = father[v];
	return v;
}
void Union(int a, int b) {
	int fathera = findfather(a);
	int fatherb = findfather(b);
	if (fathera < fatherb) father[fatherb] = fathera;
	else father[fathera] = fatherb;
}
bool cmp(node2 a, node2 b) {
	if (a.area != b.area ) return a.area > b.area;
	else return a.id < b.id;
}
int main() {
	int n, k, id, cnt = 0;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) father[i] = i;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d%d%d", &person[i].id, &person[i].fid, &person[i].mid, &k);
		vis[person[i].id] = true;
		if (person[i].fid != -1) {
			Union(person[i].id, person[i].fid);
			vis[person[i].fid] = true;
		}

		if (person[i].mid != -1) {
			Union(person[i].id, person[i].mid);
			vis[person[i].mid] = true;
		}
		for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
			scanf("%d", &person[i].cid[j]);
			Union(person[i].id, person[i].cid[j]);
			vis[person[i].cid[j]] = true;
		}
		scanf("%d%d", &person[i].num, &person[i].area);
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		id = findfather(person[i].id);
		ans[id].id = id;
		ans[id].num += person[i].num;
		ans[id].area += person[i].area;
		ans[id].flag = true;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
		if (ans[i].flag) cnt++;
		if (vis[i]) ans[findfather(i)].members++;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
		if (ans[i].flag) {
			ans[i].num = (double)(ans[i].num * 1.0 / ans[i].members);
			ans[i].area = (double)(ans[i].area * 1.0 / ans[i].members);
		}
	}
	sort(ans, ans + 10000, cmp);
	printf("%d\n", cnt);
	for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++) {
		printf("%04d %d ", ans[i].id, ans[i].members);
		printf("%.3f %.3f\n", ans[i].num, ans[i].area);
	}
	return 0;
}

A1115(äºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘å»ºç«‹ä¸DFS)

#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
struct node{
	int data;
	node*lchild,*rchild; 
};
int maxdepth=-1,num[1001]={0},n;
node* create(node*root,int v){
	if(root==NULL){
		root=new node;
		root->data=v;
		root->lchild=root->rchild=NULL;
	}
	else if(root->data>=v) root->lchild=create(root->lchild,v);
	else root->rchild=create(root->rchild,v);
	return root;
}
void dfs(node*root,int depth){
	if(root==NULL){
		maxdepth=max(depth,maxdepth);
		return;
	}
	num[depth]++;
	dfs(root->lchild,depth+1);
	dfs(root->rchild,depth+1); 
}	
int main(){
	scanf("%d",&n);
	vector<int> v(n);
	node*root=NULL;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
		scanf("%d",&v[i]);
		root=create(root,v[i]);
	}
	dfs(root,0);
	printf("%d + %d = %d",num[maxdepth-1],num[maxdepth-2],num[maxdepth-1]+num[maxdepth-2]);
	return 0;
}

using namespace std;
const int maxn=10010;
bool isprime(int n){
	if(n<=1) return false;
	int sqr=sqrt(1.0*n);
	for(int i=2;i<=sqr;i++){
		if(n%i==0) return false;
	}
	return true;
}
int main(){
	int id,n,k,rank[maxn],query;
	bool vis[maxn]={false};
	scanf("%d",&n);

	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&id);
		rank[id]=i;
	}
	scanf("%d",&k);
	while(k--){
		scanf("%d",&query);
		if(rank[query]==0) printf("%04d: Are you kidding?\n",query);
		else{
			if(vis[query]==true) printf("%04d: Checked\n",query);
		    else{
		    	vis[query]=true;
		    	if(rank[query]==1) printf("%04d: Mystery Award\n",query);
		    	else if(isprime(rank[query])) printf("%04d: Minion\n",query);
		    	else printf("%04d: Chocolate\n",query);
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 10010;
int father[maxn], cnt[maxn] = { 0 };
int findfather(int v) {
	if (father[v] == v) return v;
	else {
		int F = findfather(father[v]);
		father[v] = F;
		return F;
	}
}
void Union(int a, int b) {
	int fa = findfather(a);
	int fb = findfather(b);
	if (fa != fb) father[fa] = fb;
}
bool vis[maxn] = { false };
int main() {
	int n, k, temp, id, num = 0, sum = 0,Q;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for (int i = 0; i < maxn; i++) father[i] = i;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &k, &id);
		vis[id] = true;
		for(int j = 0; j < k-1; j++){
			scanf("%d", &temp);
			vis[temp] = true;
			Union(id, temp);
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxn; i++) {
		if (vis[i]) cnt[findfather(i)]++;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxn; i++) {
		if (cnt[i] != 0) {
			num++;
			sum += cnt[i];
		}
	}
	printf("%d %d\n", num, sum);
	scanf("%d", &Q);
	for (int i = 0; i < Q; i++){
		int q1, q2;
		scanf("%d%d", &q1, &q2);
		if (findfather(q1) != findfather(q2)) printf("No\n");
		else printf("Yes\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

A1119 (30 æ ‘çš„å‰åºå’Œååº æ±‚ä¸­åº)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> pre, post, in;
bool unique = true;
void getin(int prel, int prer, int postl, int postr) {
	if (prel == prer) {
		in.push_back(pre[prel]);
		return;
	}
	if (pre[prel] == post[postr]) {
		int i = prel + 1;
		while (i <= prer && pre[i] != post[postr - 1]) i++;
		if (i - prel > 1) getin(prel + 1, i - 1, postl, postl + (i - prel - 1) - 1);
		else unique = false;
		in.push_back(post[postr]);
		getin(i, prer, postl + (i - prel - 1), postr - 1);
	}
}
int main() {
	int n;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	pre.resize(n);
	post.resize(n);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) scanf("%d", &pre[i]);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) scanf("%d", &post[i]);
	getin(0, n - 1, 0, n - 1);
	if (unique) printf("Yes\n");
	else printf("No\n");
	printf("%d", in[0]);
	for (int i = 1; i < in.size(); i++) printf(" %d", in[i]);
    printf("\n");
	return 0;
}

A1123(30 AVL ã€å±‚åºéå†ã€åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct node {
	int data, height;
	node* lchild, * rchild;
};
node* newnode(int v) {
	node* Node = new node;
	Node->data = v;
	Node->height = 1;
	Node->lchild = Node->rchild = NULL;
	return Node;
}
int getheight(node* root) {
	if (root == NULL) return 0;
	else return root->height;
}
int getbalance(node* root) {
	return getheight(root->lchild) - getheight(root->rchild);
}
void updateheight(node* root) {
	root->height = max(getheight(root->lchild), getheight(root->rchild)) + 1;
}
void L(node*& root) {
	node* temp = root->rchild;
	root->rchild = temp->lchild;
	temp->lchild = root;
	updateheight(root);
	updateheight(temp);
	root = temp;
}
void R(node*& root) {
	node* temp = root->lchild;
	root->lchild = temp->rchild;
	temp->rchild = root;
	updateheight(root);
	updateheight(temp);
	root = temp;
}
void insert(node*& root, int v) {
	if (root == NULL) {
		root = newnode(v);
		return;
	}
	if (root->data > v) {
		insert(root->lchild, v);
		updateheight(root);
		if (getbalance(root) == 2) {
			if (getbalance(root->lchild) == 1) {
				R(root);
			}
			else if (getbalance(root->lchild) == -1) {
				L(root->lchild);
				R(root);
			}
		}
	}
	else {
		insert(root->rchild, v);
		updateheight(root);
		if (getbalance(root) == -2) {
			if (getbalance(root->rchild) == -1) {
				L(root);
			}
			else if (getbalance(root->rchild) == 1) {
				R(root->rchild);
				L(root);
			}
		}
	}
}
int iscomplete = 1, after = 0;
vector<int> levelorder(node* root) {
	queue<node*> q;
	vector<int> v;
	q.push(root);
	while (!q.empty()) {
		node* temp = q.front();
		q.pop();
		v.push_back(temp->data);
		if (temp->lchild != NULL) {
			if (after) iscomplete = 0;
			q.push(temp->lchild);
		}
		else after = 1;
		if (temp->rchild != NULL) {
			if (after) iscomplete = 0;
			q.push(temp->rchild);
		}
		else after = 1;
	}
	return v;
}
int main() {
	int n, temp;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	node* root = NULL;
	vector<int> ans;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d", &temp);
		insert(root, temp);
	}
	ans = levelorder(root);
	for (int i = 0; i < ans.size(); i++) {
		if (i != 0) printf(" ");
		printf("%d", ans[i]);
	}
	printf("\n");
	if (iscomplete) printf("YES");
	else printf("NO");
	return 0;
}

#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 520;
bool vis[maxn] = { false };
vector<vector<int> > g;
int cnt = 0;
void dfs(int index) {
	vis[index] = true;
	cnt++;
	for (int i = 0; i < g[index].size(); i++) {
		if (vis[g[index][i]] == false) {
			dfs(g[index][i]);
		}
	}
}
int main() {
	int n, m, a, b, even = 0, odd = 0;
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
	g.resize(n + 1);
	for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
		g[a].push_back(b);
		g[b].push_back(a);
	}
	dfs(1);
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		printf("%d", g[i].size());
		if (i < n) printf(" ");
		else printf("\n");
		if (g[i].size() % 2 == 0) even++;
		else odd++;
	}
	if (cnt == n && even == n) printf("Eulerian");
	else if (cnt == n && even == n - 2 && odd == 2) printf("Semi-Eulerian");
	else printf("Non-Eulerian");

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct node {
	int v;
	node* lchild, * rchild;
};
vector<int> in, post;
vector<int>ans[31];
node* create(int inl, int inr, int postl, int postr) {
	if (inl > inr) return NULL;
	node* root = new node;
	root->v = post[postr];
	int i=inl;
	while (in[i] != post[postr]) i++;
	int leafnum = i - inl;
	root->lchild = create(inl, i - 1, postl, postl + leafnum - 1);
	root->rchild = create(i + 1, inr, postl + leafnum, postr - 1);
	return root;
}
int maxdepth = -1;
void dfs(node* root,int depth) {
	if (root == NULL) return;
	maxdepth = max(depth, maxdepth);
	ans[depth].push_back(root->v);
	dfs(root->lchild, depth + 1);
	dfs(root->rchild, depth + 1);
}int main() {
	int n;
	scanf_s("%d", &n);
	in.resize(n), post.resize(n);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) scanf_s("%d", &in[i]);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) scanf_s("%d", &post[i]);
	node* root = NULL;
	root = create(0, n - 1, 0, n - 1);
	dfs(root, 0);
	printf("%d", ans[0][0]);
	for (int i = 1; i <= maxdepth; i++) {
		if (i % 2 == 1) {
			for (int j = 0; j < ans[i].size(); j++) printf(" %d", ans[i][j]);
		}
		else {
			for (int j = ans[i].size()-1; j >=0; j--) printf(" %d", ans[i][j]);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
struct node {
	string data;
	int l, r;
}tree[25];
string dfs(int root) {
	if (tree[root].l == -1 && tree[root].r == -1) return tree[root].data;
	else if (tree[root].l == -1 && tree[root].r != -1) return "(" + tree[root].data + dfs(tree[root].r) + ")";
	else if (tree[root].l != -1 && tree[root].r != -1) return "(" + dfs(tree[root].l) + tree[root].data + dfs(tree[root].r) + ")";
}
int main() {
	int n, have[25] = { 0 }, root = 1;
	cin >> n;
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		cin >> tree[i].data >> tree[i].l >> tree[i].r;
		have[tree[i].l] = 1;
		have[tree[i].r] = 1;
	}
	while (have[root] == 1) root++;
	string ans = dfs(root);
	if (ans[0] == '(') ans = ans.substr(1, ans.length() - 2);
	cout << ans;
	return 0;
}

A1131(30 DFS ã€unordered_mapé‚»æ¥çŸ©é˜µã€ éš¾é¢˜ )

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<unordered_map>
using namespace std;
vector<vector<int> > v(10000);
int visit[10000] = { 0 }, mincnt, mintransfer, st, ed;
unordered_map<int, int> line;
vector<int> path, temppath;
int transfercnt(vector<int> a) {
	int cnt = -1, preline = 0;
	for (int i = 1; i < a.size(); i++) {
		if (line[a[i - 1] * 10000 + a[i]] != preline) cnt++;
		preline = line[a[i - 1] * 10000 + a[i]];
	}
	return cnt;
}
void dfs(int node, int cnt) {
	if (node == ed && (cnt < mincnt || (cnt == mincnt && transfercnt(temppath) < mintransfer))) {
		mincnt = cnt;
		mintransfer = transfercnt(temppath);
		path = temppath;
    return;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < v[node].size(); i++) {
		if (visit[v[node][i]] == 0) {
			visit[v[node][i]] = 1;
			temppath.push_back(v[node][i]);
			dfs(v[node][i], cnt + 1);
			visit[v[node][i]] = 0;
			temppath.pop_back();
		}
	}
}
int main() {
	int n, m, pre, temp, k;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &m, &pre);
		for (int j = 1; j < m; j++) {
			scanf("%d", &temp);
			v[pre].push_back(temp);
			v[temp].push_back(pre);
			line[pre * 10000 + temp]=line[temp*10000+pre] = i;
			pre = temp;
		}
	}
	scanf("%d", &k);
	while (k--) {
		mintransfer = mincnt = 1000000000;
		scanf("%d%d", &st, &ed);
		temppath.clear();
		temppath.push_back(st);
		visit[st] = 1;
		dfs(st, 0);
		visit[st] = 0;
		printf("%d\n", mincnt);
		int preline = 0, pretransfer = st;
		for (int i = 1; i < path.size(); i++) {
			if (line[path[i - 1] * 10000 + path[i]] != preline) {
				if (preline != 0) printf("Take Line#%d from %04d to %04d.\n", preline, pretransfer, path[i - 1]);
				preline = line[path[i - 1] * 10000 + path[i]];
				pretransfer = path[i - 1];
			}
		}
		printf("Take Line#%d from %04d to %04d.\n", preline, pretransfer, ed);
	}
	return 0;
}

A1135(30 åˆ¤æ–­çº¢é»‘æ ‘ é€’å½’åˆ¤æ–­)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct node{
	int v;
	node* lchild,*rchild;
};
node*create(node*root,int x){
	if(root==NULL) {
		root=new node;
		root->v=x;
		root->lchild=root->rchild=NULL;
	}
	else if(abs(root->v)>abs(x)) root->lchild=create(root->lchild,x);
	else if(abs(root->v)<=abs(x)) root->rchild=create(root->rchild,x);
	return root;
}
bool judge1(node*root){
	if(root==NULL) return true;
	if(root->v<0){
		if(root->lchild!=NULL&&root->lchild->v<0) return false;
		if(root->rchild!=NULL&&root->rchild->v<0) return false;
	}
	return judge1(root->lchild)&&judge1(root->rchild);
}
int getblacknum(node*root){
	if(root==NULL) return 0;
	int l=getblacknum(root->lchild);
	int r=getblacknum(root->rchild);
	return root->v>0?max(l,r)+1:max(l,r);
}
bool judge2(node*root){
	if(root==NULL) return true;
	int l=getblacknum(root->lchild);
	int r=getblacknum(root->rchild);
	if(l!=r) return false;
	return judge2(root->lchild)&&judge2(root->rchild);
}
int main(){
	int k,n;
	scanf("%d",&k);
	while(k--){
		scanf("%d",&n);
		vector<int> tree(n);
		node*root=NULL;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%d",&tree[i]);
			root=create(root,tree[i]);
		}
		if(tree[0]>0&&judge1(root)&&judge2(root)) printf("Yes\n");
		else printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

A1136 (20 å›æ–‡ä¸² å­—ç¬¦ä¸²)

#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string add(string s1, string s2) {
	string s = s1;
	int carry = 0;
	for (int i = s1.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
		s[i] = ((s1[i] - '0') + (s2[i] - '0') + carry) % 10 + '0';
		carry = ((s1[i] - '0') + (s2[i] - '0') + carry) / 10;
	}
	if (carry > 0) s = '1' + s;
	return s;
}
int main() {
	int n = 10;
	string origin, ans, ansv,rev;
	cin >> origin;
	rev = origin;
	reverse(rev.begin(), rev.end());
	if (origin == rev) {
		cout << rev << " is a palindromic number.";
		return 0;
	}
	while (n--) {
		rev = origin;
		reverse(rev.begin(), rev.end());
		ans = add(origin, rev);
		ansv = ans;
		reverse(ansv.begin(), ansv.end());
		cout << origin << " + " << rev << " = " << ans << endl;
		if (ansv != ans) origin = ans;
		else {
			cout << ans << " is a palindromic number.";
			return 0;
		}
	}
	cout << "Not found in 10 iterations.";
	return 0;
}

		}

	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){

#include<unordered_map>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
struct node{
	int a,b;
};
bool cmp(const node &i,const node &j){
	return i.a!=j.a? i.a<j.a : i.b<j.b;
}
unordered_map<int ,bool> isfri;
int main(){
	int n,m,k,c,d;
	cin>>n>>m;
	string a,b;
	vector<int> v[10000];
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(a.length()==b.length()) {
			v[abs(stoi(a))].push_back(abs(stoi(b)));
			v[abs(stoi(b))].push_back(abs(stoi(a)));
		}
isfri[abs(stoi(a))*10000+abs(stoi(b))]=isfri[abs(stoi(b))*10000+abs(stoi(a))]=true;
	}
	cin>>k;
	while(k--){
		vector<node> ans;
		cin>>c>>d;
		for(int i=0;i<v[abs(c)].size();i++){
			for(int j=0;j<v[abs(d)].size();j++){
				if(v[abs(c)][i]==abs(d)||v[abs(d)][j]==abs(c)) continue;
				if(isfri[v[abs(c)][i]*10000+v[abs(d)][j]]==true) ans.push_back(node{v[abs(c)][i],v[abs(d)][j]});
			}
		}
		sort(ans.begin(),ans.end(),cmp);
		cout<<ans.size()<<endl;
		for(int i=0;i<ans.size();i++) printf("%04d %04d\n",ans[i].a,ans[i].b);
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream> 
#include<map>
#include<cctype>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=100010;
struct node{
	string name;
	double totalscore;
	int num;
}school[maxn];
bool cmp(node a,node b){
	if((int)a.totalscore!=(int)b.totalscore) return (int)a.totalscore>(int)b.totalscore;
	else if(a.num!=b.num) return a.num<b.num;
	else return a.name<b.name;
}
map<string,int> s;
int main(){
	int n,num=0;
	double score;
	string id,schoolname;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(int i=0;i<maxn;i++){
		school[i].totalscore=0;
		school[i].num=0;
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>id>>score>>schoolname;
		for(int j=0;j<schoolname.size();j++){
			if(isupper(schoolname[j])) schoolname[j]+=32;
		}
		if(s.count(schoolname)==0){
			s[schoolname]=num;
			school[s[schoolname]].name=schoolname;
			num++;
		}
		if(id[0]=='B') score=score/1.5;
		if(id[0]=='T') score=score*1.5;
		school[s[schoolname]].totalscore+=score;
		school[s[schoolname]].num++;
	}
	cout<<num<<endl;
	sort(school,school+num,cmp);
	int r=1;
	printf("%d %s %d %d\n",r,school[0].name.c_str(),(int)school[0].totalscore,school[0].num);
	for(int i=1;i<num;i++){
		if((int)school[i].totalscore!=(int)school[i-1].totalscore) r=i+1;
		printf("%d %s %d %d\n",r,school[i].name.c_str(),(int)school[i].totalscore,school[i].num);
	}
	return 0;
}

A1142(25 æ— å‘å®Œå…¨å›¾ æœ€å¤§å­å›¾ ä¸¤ç‚¹ç›¸è¿)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int g[210][210]={0};
	int nv,ne,v1,v2,k,n;
	scanf("%d%d",&nv,&ne);
	for(int i=0;i<ne;i++){
		scanf("%d%d",&v1,&v2);
		g[v1][v2]=1;
		g[v2][v1]=1;
	}
	scanf("%d",&k);
	while(k--){
		int hash[nv+1]={0};
		int ismax=1,iscli=1;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		vector<int> v(n);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%d",&v[i]);
			hash[v[i]]=1;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++){
				if(g[v[i]][v[j]]==0)
				iscli=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(iscli==0) {
			printf("Not a Clique\n");
			continue;
		}
		for(int i=1;i<=nv;i++){
			if(hash[i]==0){
				for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
					if(g[v[j]][i]==0) break;
					if(j==n-1) ismax=0;
				}
			}
		}
		if(iscli==1&&ismax==1) printf("Yes\n");
		else if(iscli==1&&ismax==0) printf("Not Maximal\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 10010;
map<int, bool> node;
int main() {
	int m, n, v, u, a;
	scanf("%d%d", &m, &n);
	vector<int> pre(n);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d", &pre[i]);
		node[pre[i]] = true;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);
		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
			a = pre[j];
			if ((a >= u && a <= v) || (a <= u && a >= v)) break;
		}
		if (node.count(u) == 0 && node.count(v) == 0) printf("ERROR: %d and %d are not found.\n", u, v);
		else if (node.count(u) == 0 || node.count(v) == 0) printf("ERROR: %d is not found.\n", node.count(u) == 0?u:v);
		else if ((a < u && a > v) || (a > u && a < v)) printf("LCA of %d and %d is %d.\n", u, v, a);
		else if (a == v || a == u) printf("%d is an ancestor of %d.\n", a, a == v ? u : v);
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
bool isprime(int x){
	int sqr=sqrt(1.0*x);
	for(int i=2;i<=sqr;i++){
		if(x%i==0) return false;
	}
	return true;
}
int main(){
	int msize,n,m,a;
	scanf("%d%d%d",&msize,&n,&m);
	while(!isprime(msize)) msize++;
	vector<int> v(msize);
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&a);
		int flag=0;
		for(int j=0;j<msize;j++){
			int pos=(a+j*j)%msize;
			if(v[pos]==0){
				flag=1;
				v[pos]=a;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==0) printf("%d cannot be inserted.\n",a);
	}
	int cnt=0,temp;
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		scanf("%d",&temp);
		for(int j=0;j<=msize;j++){//æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„<=ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¦å›åˆ°åˆå§‹çš„ä½ç½®æ‰çŸ¥é“æ˜¯å¦èƒ½æ’å…¥
			cnt++;
			if(v[(temp+j*j)%msize]==temp||v[(temp+j*j)%msize]==0) break;
		}
	}
	printf("%.1f",cnt*1.0/m);
    return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int a, b, flag = 0, in[1010] = { 0 }, n, m, k;
	vector<int> v[1010];
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
		v[a].push_back(b);
		in[b]++;
	}
	scanf("%d", &k);
	for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
		int judge = 1;
		vector<int> query(in, in + n + 1);
		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
			scanf("%d", &a);
			if (query[a] != 0) judge = 0;
			for (int x = 0; x < v[a].size(); x++) query[v[a][x]]--;
		}
    if(judge==1) continue;
		else if (flag == 1 && judge == 0) printf(" %d", i);
		else if (flag == 0 && judge == 0) printf("%d", i);
		flag = 1;
	}
	return 0;
}

A1147(30 åˆ¤æ–­å¤§é¡¶å †å°é¡¶å † ååºéå†)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int m, n, num = 0;
vector<int>v;
void dfs(int index) {//ååºéå†
	if (index > n) return;
	dfs(index * 2);
	dfs(index * 2 + 1);
	printf("%d", v[index]);
	if (num < n - 1)printf(" ");
	num++;
}
int main() {
	scanf_s("%d%d", &m, &n);
	while (m--) {
		v.resize(n+1);
		bool flagmin = true, flagmax = true;
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf_s("%d", &v[i]);
		for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
			if (v[i] >= v[i / 2]) flagmax = false;
			if (v[i] <= v[i / 2]) flagmin = false;
		}
		if (flagmin) printf("Min Heap\n");
		else if (flagmax) printf("Max Heap\n");
		else if (flagmax == false && flagmin == false) printf("Not Heap\n");
		dfs(1);
		num = 0;
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	vector<int> v(n+1);
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) cin>>v[i];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		for(int j=i+1;j<=n;j++){
			vector<int> lie,a(n+1,1);
			a[i]=a[j]=-1;
			for(int k=1;k<=n;k++){
				if(v[k]*a[abs(v[k])]<0) lie.push_back(k);
			}
			if(lie.size()==2&&(a[lie[0]]+a[lie[1]])==0){
				cout<<i<<" "<<j;
				return 0;
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<"No Solution";
	return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
map<int, vector<int> >danger;
int main() {
	int n, m, k, d1, d2;
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
	vector<int> G(n + 1);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		scanf("%d%d", &d1, &d2);
		danger[d1].push_back(d2);
		danger[d2].push_back(d1);
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		bool flag = false;
        vector<int> G(n + 1);
		int exist[100000] = { 0 };
		scanf("%d", &k);
		for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
			scanf("%d", &G[j]);
			exist[G[j]] = 1;
		}
		for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
			for (int p = 0; p < danger[G[j]].size(); p++) {
				if (exist[danger[G[j]][p]] == 1) flag = true;
			}
		}
		if (flag == false) printf("Yes\n");
		else printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

A1150(25 åˆ¤æ–­å¾ªç¯å›¾ è¾“å‡ºæœ€å°è·¯å¾„)

#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,m,k,mindis=1000000000,ansid;
	int g[210][210]={0};
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		int v1,v2,d;
		scanf("%d%d%d",&v1,&v2,&d);
		g[v1][v2]=d;
		g[v2][v1]=d;
	}
	scanf("%d",&k);
	for(int y=1;y<=k;y++){
		int cnt,flag=1,index,sum=0;
		scanf("%d",&cnt);
		set<int>s;
		vector<int> v(cnt);
		for(int i=0;i<cnt;i++){
			scanf("%d",&v[i]);
			s.insert(v[i]);
		} 
		for(int i=0;i<cnt-1;i++){
			if(g[v[i]][v[i+1]]==0) flag=0;
			sum+=g[v[i]][v[i+1]];
		}
		if(flag==0) printf("Path %d: NA (Not a TS cycle)\n",y);
		else if(v[0]!=v[cnt-1]||s.size()!=n) printf("Path %d: %d (Not a TS cycle)\n",y,sum);
		else if(cnt!=n+1){
			if(sum<mindis){
				mindis=sum;
				ansid=y;
			}
			printf("Path %d: %d (TS cycle)\n",y,sum);
		}else{
			if(sum<mindis){
				mindis=sum;
				ansid=y;
			}
			printf("Path %d: %d (TS simple cycle)\n",y,sum);
		}
	}
	printf("Shortest Dist(%d) = %d",ansid,mindis);
	return 0;
}

A1151

#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=10010;
map<int,int> pos;
vector<int> ins,pre;
void lca(int inl,int inr,int preroot,int a,int b){
	if(inl>inr) return;
	int inroot=pos[pre[preroot]],ain=pos[a],bin=pos[b];
	if(ain<inroot&&bin<inroot) lca(inl,inroot-1,preroot+1,a,b);
	else if((ain<inroot&&bin>inroot)||(ain>inroot&&bin<inroot)){
		printf("LCA of %d and %d is %d.\n",a,b,ins[inroot]);
	}
	else if(ain>inroot&&bin>inroot) lca(inroot+1,inr,preroot+1+(inroot-inl),a,b);
	else if(ain==inroot) printf("%d is an ancestor of %d.\n",a,b);
	else if(bin==inroot) printf("%d is an ancestor of %d.\n",b,a);
}
int main(){
	int m,n,a,b;
	scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
	ins.resize(n + 1), pre.resize(n + 1);
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&ins[i]);
		pos[ins[i]]=i;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) scanf("%d",&pre[i]);
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		if(pos.count(a)==0&&pos.count(b)!=0) printf("ERROR: %d is not found.\n",a);
		if(pos.count(b)==0&&pos.count(a)!=0) printf("ERROR: %d is not found.\n",b);
		if(pos.count(a)==0&&pos.count(b)==0) printf("ERROR: %d and %d are not found.\n",a,b);
		if(pos.count(a)!=0&&pos.count(b)!=0) lca(1,n,1,a,b);
	}
	return 0;
}

A1153(25 æ¨¡æ‹Ÿ æ’åºå¼•ç”¨ä¼ å‚ vector unordered_map)

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<unordered_map>
using namespace std;
struct node {
	string info;
	int score;
};
bool cmp(const node& a, const node& b) {
	return a.score != b.score ? a.score > b.score : a.info < b.info;
}
int main() {
	int n, m, type;
	string t;
	cin >> n >> m;
	vector<node> v(n);
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> v[i].info >> v[i].score;
	for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
		vector<node> ans;
		cin >> type >> t;
		printf("Case %d: %d %s\n", i, type, t.c_str());
		int sum = 0, cnt = 0;
		if (type == 1) {
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				if (t[0] == v[j].info[0]) ans.push_back(v[j]);
			}
		}
		else if (type == 2) {
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				if (v[j].info.substr(1, 3) == t) {
					cnt++;
					sum += v[j].score;
				}
			}
			if (cnt != 0) printf("%d %d\n", cnt, sum);
		}
		else {
			unordered_map<string, int> m;
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				if (v[j].info.substr(4, 6) == t) m[v[j].info.substr(1, 3)]++;
			}
			for (auto it : m) ans.push_back({ it.first,it.second });
		}
		sort(ans.begin(), ans.end(), cmp);
		for (int j = 0; j < ans.size(); j++) printf("%s %d\n", ans[j].info.c_str(), ans[j].score);
		if (((type == 1 || type == 3) && ans.size() == 0) || (type == 2 && cnt == 0)) printf("NA\n");
	}
	return 0;
}

	cin >> k;
	for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {

A1155(30 å®Œå…¨äºŒå‰æ ‘ åˆ¤æ–­å¤§é¡¶å †å°é¡¶å † dfs æ‰“å°è·¯å¾„)

#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int>v;
int n, a[1010];
void dfs(int index) {
	if (index * 2 > n && index * 2 + 1 > n) {
		if (index <= n) {
			for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
				if (i != 0) printf(" ");
				printf("%d", v[i]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
	}
	else {
		v.push_back(a[index * 2 + 1]);
		dfs(index * 2 + 1);
		v.pop_back();
		v.push_back(a[index * 2]);
		dfs(index * 2);
		v.pop_back();
	}
}
int main() {
	bool minflag = true, maxflag = true;
	scanf("%d", &n);
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);
	v.push_back(a[1]);
	for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
		if (a[i] >= a[i / 2]) maxflag = false;
		if (a[i] <= a[i / 2]) minflag = false;
	}
	dfs(1);
	if (minflag) printf("Min Heap");
	else if (maxflag) printf("Max Heap");
	else if (maxflag == false && minflag == false) printf("Not Heap");
	return 0;
}

    string add(string s1, string s2) {
	string s = s1;
	int carry = 0;
	for (int i = s1.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
		s[i] = ((s1[i] - '0') + (s2[i] - '0') + carry) % 10 + '0';
		carry = ((s1[i] - '0') + (s2[i] - '0') + carry) / 10;
	}
	if (carry > 0) s = '1' + s;
	return s;
}

    long long convert(string n, long long radix) {
 long long sum = 0;
 int index = 0, temp = 0;
 for (auto it = n.rbegin(); it != n.rend(); it++) {
 temp = isdigit(*it) ? *it - '0' : *it - 'a' + 10;
 sum += temp * pow(radix, index++);
 }
 return sum;
}

      void insertSort(){

      int partition(int A[],int left,int right){
    int temp=A[left];
    while(left<right){
        while(right>left&&A[right]>temp) right--;
        A[left]=A[right];
        while(left<right&&A[left]<=temp) left++;
        A[right]=A[left];
    }
    A[left]=temp;
    return left;
}
void quicksort(int A[],int left,int right){
    if(left<right){
        int pos=partition(A,left,right);
        quicksort(A,left,pos-1);
        quciksort(A,pos+1,right);
    }
}

}

      void downadjust(int low, int high) {
	int i = low, j = 2 * i;
	while (j <= high) {
		if (j + 1 <= high && heap[j + 1] > heap[j]) {
			j = j + 1;
		}
		if (heap[i] < heap[j]) {
			swap(heap[i], heap[j]);
			i = j;
			j = 2 * i;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}
	}
}
void upadjust(int low, int high) {
	int i = high, j = i / 2;
	while (j >= low) {
		if (heap[i] < heap[j]) {
			swap(heap[i], heap[j]);
			i = j;
			j = i / 2;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}
	}
}
void createheap() {//å»ºå †
	for (int i = n / 2; i >= 1; i--) {
		downadjust(i, n);
	}
}
void heapsort(){
    createheap();
    for(int i=n;i>1;i--){
        swap(heap[1],heap[i]);
        upadjust(1,i-1);
    }
}

    struct fraction {
	ll up, down;
}a, b;
fraction reduction(fraction result) {
	if (result.down < 0) {
		result.up = -result.up;
		result.down = -result.down;
	}
	if (result.up == 0) result.down = 1;
	else {
		ll gcdvalue = gcd(abs(result.up), abs(result.down));
		result.up /= gcdvalue;
		result.down /= gcdvalue;
	}
	return result;
}

    fraction add(fraction f1, fraction f2) {
	fraction result;
	result.up = f1.up * f2.down + f1.down * f2.up;
	result.down = f1.down * f2.down;
	return reduction(result);
}

    void showresult(fraction r) {
	r = reduction(r);
	if (r.up < 0) printf("(");
	if (r.down == 1) printf("%lld", r.up);
	else if (abs(r.up) < r.down) printf("%lld/%lld", r.up, r.down);
	else if (abs(r.up) > r.down) printf("%lld %lld/%lld", r.up / r.down, abs(r.up) % r.down, r.down);
	if (r.up < 0) printf(")");
}

    bool isprime(int n) {

    int sqr = sqrt(1.0 * n);

	}

}

    struct bign {
	int d[1000];
	int len;
	bign() {
		len = 0;
		memset(d, 0, sizeof(d));
	}
};
bign change(string str) {
	bign a;
	a.len = str.length();
	for (int i = 0; i < a.len; i++) {
		a.d[i] = str[a.len - 1 - i]-'0';
	}
	return a;
}
bign multi(bign a, int b) {
	bign c;
	int carry=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < a.len; i++) {
		int temp = a.d[i] * b + carry;
		c.d[c.len++] = temp % 10;
		carry = temp / 10;
	}
	while (carry != 0) {
		c.d[c.len++] = carry % 10;
		carry /= 10;
	}
	return c;
}

    void DFS(int index, int nowk, int sum, int facsum) {
	if (sum == n && nowk == k) {
		if (facsum > maxfacsum) {
			ans = temp;//æ›´æ–°æœ€ä¼˜åºåˆ—
			maxfacsum = facsum;
		}
		return;
	}
	if (nowk > k || sum > n) return;
	if (index - 1 >= 0) {
		temp.push_back(index);
		DFS(index, nowk + 1, sum + fac[index], facsum + index);
		temp.pop_back();
		DFS(index - 1, nowk, sum, facsum);
	}
}

      node* create(int postL, int postR, int inL, int inR) {//ååºåŠ ä¸­åº
	if (postL > postR) return NULL;
	node* root = new node;
	root->data = postorder[postR];
	int k;
	for (int i = inL; i <= inR; i++) {
		if (inorder[i] == root->data) {
			k = i;
			break;
		}
	}
	int leafnum = k - inL;
	root->lchild = create(postL, postL + leafnum - 1, inL, k - 1);
	root->rchild = create(postL + leafnum, postR - 1, k + 1, inR);
	return root;
}

using namespace std;
#define INF 0x3fffffff
typedef struct node{				//ç»“ç‚¹å®šä¹‰ 
	int data;
	struct node *right,*left;
}Node;
vector<int> inor,layor;				//ä¸­åºå’Œå±‚åºåºåˆ— 
unordered_map<int,int> inmp,laymp;	//åºåˆ—ä¸å…¶ä¸‹æ ‡çš„æ˜ å°„ï¼Œï¼ˆå»ºç«‹æ˜ å°„å¯ä»¥å‡å°‘é€’å½’æ—¶å€™æŸ¥æ‰¾åºåˆ—çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰ 
Node *creat(int il,int ir){			//å»ºæ ‘å‡½æ•° ï¼Œilè¡¨ç¤ºä¸­åºåºåˆ—çš„å·¦ç«¯ï¼Œirä¾¿æ˜¯ä¸­åºåºåˆ—çš„å³ç«¯ 
	if(il>ir) return NULL;			//å¦‚æœæ ‘ä¸­åºåˆ—é•¿åº¦ä¸º0ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºåˆ°äº†ç©ºç»“ç‚¹ 
	int min=INF,id;					//minè¡¨ç¤ºä¸­åºåºåˆ—ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ åœ¨å±‚åºä¸­ä¸‹æ ‡æœ€å°çš„é‚£ä¸ªï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åºçš„ä¸‹æ ‡ 
	for(int i=il;i<=ir;i++){		//éå†ä¸­åºåºåˆ—ï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºå¯¹åº”å±‚åºä¸­ä¸‹è¾¹æœ€å°çš„å…ƒç´  
		if(laymp[inor[i]]<min){
			min=laymp[inor[i]];
		}
	}
	Node *root=new node;			
	root->data=layor[min];			//ä¸­åºåºåˆ—ä¸­ å±‚åºä¸­ä¸‹æ ‡æœ€å°çš„ä¾¿æ˜¯æ ¹ 
	id=inmp[root->data];			//è·å¾—æ ¹åœ¨ä¸­åºçš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œåˆ’åˆ†ä¸ºå·¦å­æ ‘å’Œå³å­æ ‘ 
	root->left=creat(il,id-1);		//é€’å½’å·¦å­æ ‘ 
	root->right=creat(id+1,ir);		//é€’å½’å³å­æ ‘ 
	return root;					//è¿”å›å½“å‰å­æ ‘çš„æ ¹ 
}
void preorder(Node *root){			//é€’å½’çš„å…ˆåºéå†å‡½æ•° 
	if(root==NULL) return;
	printf("%d ",root->data);
	preorder(root->left);
	preorder(root->right);
}
int main(void){

	int n;
	cin>>n;
	inor.resize(n); layor.resize(n);//è¯»å…¥å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°å¹¶åˆå§‹åŒ– 
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){			//è¯»å…¥ä¸­åºåºåˆ—å¹¶å®Œæˆæ˜ å°„ 
		cin>>inor[i];
		inmp[inor[i]]=i;
	} 
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){			//è¯»å…¥å±‚åºåºåˆ—å¹¶å®Œæˆæ˜ å°„ 
		cin>>layor[i];
		laymp[layor[i]]=i;
	} 
	Node *root=creat(0,n-1);		//å»ºæ ‘ 
	preorder(root);					//å…ˆåºéå†ï¼ŒéªŒè¯æ ‘çš„ç»“æ„ 
	return 0;
}

      void getin(int prel, int prer, int postl, int postr) {
	if (prel == prer) {
		in.push_back(pre[prel]);
		return;
	}
	if (pre[prel] == post[postr]) {
		int i = prel + 1;
	while (i <= prer && pre[i] != post[postr - 1]) i++;
		if (i - prel > 1) getin(prel + 1, i - 1, postl, postl + (i - prel - 1) - 1);
		else unique = false;
		in.push_back(post[postr]);
		getin(i, prer, postl + (i - prel - 1), postr - 1);
	}
}

      int iscomplete = 1, after = 0;
vector<int> levelorder(node* root) {//å±‚åºéå†ä¸­
	queue<node*> q;
	vector<int> v;
	q.push(root);
	while (!q.empty()) {
		node* temp = q.front();
		q.pop();
		v.push_back(temp->data);
		if (temp->lchild != NULL) {
			if (after) iscomplete = 0;
			q.push(temp->lchild);
		}
		else after = 1;
		if (temp->rchild != NULL) {
			if (after) iscomplete = 0;
			q.push(temp->rchild);

	}
	return v;

    void DFS(int index,int depth){

}

    void BFS() {
  	level[1] = 1;
  	queue<int> q;
  	q.push(1);
  	while (!q.empty()) {
  		int now = q.front();
  		q.pop();
  		if (child[now].size() == 0) {
  			hashtable[level[now]]++;
  			maxlevel = max(maxlevel, level[now]);
  		}
  		for (int i = 0; i < child[now].size(); i++) {
  			level[child[now][i]] = level[now] + 1;
  			q.push(child[now][i]);
  		}
  	}
  }`

      void insert(node*& root, int v) {
	if (root == NULL) {
		root = newnode(v);
		return;
	}
	if (root->data > v) {
		insert(root->lchild, v);
		updateheight(root);
		if (getbalance(root) == 2) {
			if (getbalance(root->lchild) == 1) {
				R(root);
			}
			else if (getbalance(root->lchild) == -1) {
				L(root->lchild);
				R(root);
			}
		}
	}
	else {
		insert(root->rchild, v);
		updateheight(root);
		if (getbalance(root) == -2) {
			if (getbalance(root->rchild) == -1) {
				L(root);
			}
			else if (getbalance(root->rchild) == 1) {
				R(root->rchild);
				L(root);
			}
		}
	}
}

      void downadjust(int low, int high) {
	int i = low, j = 2 * i;
	while (j <= high) {
		if (j + 1 <= high && heap[j + 1] > heap[j]) {
			j = j + 1;
		}
		if (heap[i] < heap[j]) {
			swap(heap[i], heap[j]);
			i = j;
			j = 2 * i;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}
	}
}

      void deletetop() {

	downadjust(1, n);
}

    • å‘ä¸Šè°ƒæ•´

      void upadjust(int low, int high) {
	int i = high, j = i / 2;
	while (j >= low) {
		if (heap[i] < heap[j]) {
			swap(heap[i], heap[j]);
			i = j;
			j = i / 2;
		}
		else {
			break;
		}
	}
}

    • dijkstraç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç 

      void dijkst(int s){
	fill(vis,vis+maxn,false);
	fill(d,d+maxn,INF);
	fill(w,w+maxn,0);
	fill(pt,pt+maxn,0);
	fill(num,num+maxn,0);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) pre[i]=i;
	d[s]=0;
	w[s]=weight[s];
	num[s]=1;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		int u=-1,MIN=INF;
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
			if(vis[j]==false&&d[j]<MIN){
				u=j;
				MIN=d[u];
			}
		}
		if(u==-1) return;
		vis[u]=true;
		for(int v=0;v<n;v++){
			if(vis[v]==false&&G[u][v]!=INF){
				if(d[v]>d[u]+G[u][v]){
					d[v]=d[u]+G[u][v];
					w[v]=w[u]+weight[v];	
					num[v]=num[u];
					pt[v]=pt[u]+1;
					pre[v]=u;
				}else if(d[v]==d[u]+G[u][v]){
					num[v]+=num[u];
					if(w[v]<w[u]+weight[v]){
						w[v]=w[u]+weight[v];
						pt[v]=pt[u]+1;
						pre[v]=u;
					}else if(w[v]==weight[v]+w[u]){
						double avgfun1=w[v]*1.0/pt[v];
						double avgfun2=(weight[v]+w[u])*1.0/(pt[u]+1);
						if(avgfun2>avgfun1){
							pt[v]=pt[u]+1;
							pre[v]=u;
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

    #include<cstdio>
const int maxn=10010;
int a[maxn],dp[maxn],s[maxn]={0};//sæ•°ç»„è®°å½•æœ€å¤§è¿ç»­å­åºåˆ—çš„èµ·å§‹å…ƒç´ 
int main(){

	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		if(a[i]>=0) flag=true;
	}
	if(flag==false){
		printf("0 %d %d",a[0],a[n-1]);
		return 0;
	}
    dp[0]=a[0];//è¾¹ç•Œåˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶--------------------------------------------------------
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
		if(a[i]>dp[i-1]+a[i]){
			dp[i]=a[i];
			s[i]=i;
		} 
		else {
			dp[i]=dp[i-1]+a[i];
			s[i]=s[i-1];
		}
	}
	int k=0;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
		if(dp[i]>dp[k]){//é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚è¾“å‡ºiï¼Œjæœ€å°çš„åºåˆ—ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™é‡Œçš„åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯>è€Œä¸æ˜¯>=
			k=i;
		}
	}
	printf("%d %d %d",dp[k],a[s[k]],a[k]);
	return 0;
}

    çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹:dp[i]=max{1,dp[j]+1}

    å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨a[i]ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ a[j] (j<i)ï¼Œä½¿å¾—a[j]<=a[i]å¹¶ä¸”dp[j]+1>dp[i],é‚£ä¹ˆå°±æŠŠa[i]è·Ÿåœ¨ä»¥a[j]ä¸ºç»“å°¾çš„LISåé¢ï¼Œå½¢æˆä¸€æ¡æ›´é•¿çš„ä¸ä¸‹é™å­åºåˆ—(ä»¤dp[i]=dp[j]+1)

    å¦‚æœa[i]ä¹‹å‰çš„å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ¯”a[i]å¤§ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆa[i]å°±åªå¥½è‡ªå·±å½¢æˆä¸€æ¡LISï¼Œé•¿åº¦ä¸º1

    #include<cstdio> 
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=10010;
int hashtable[maxn],a[maxn],dp[maxn];
int main(){
	int num=0,ans=-1,n,m,L,temp;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	scanf("%d",&m);
	fill(hashtable,hashtable+maxn,-1);
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		scanf("%d",&temp);
		hashtable[temp]=i;
	}
	scanf("%d",&L);
	for(int i=0;i<L;i++){
		scanf("%d",&temp);
		if(hashtable[temp]>=0){
			a[num++]=hashtable[temp];
		}
	}
	for(int i=0;i<num;i++){
		dp[i]=1;//è¾¹ç•Œåˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶--------------------------------------
		for(int j=0;j<i;j++){
			if(a[i]>=a[j]&&dp[j]+1>dp[i]){
				dp[i]=dp[j]+1;
			}
		}
  	ans=max(ans,dp[i]);
	}
	printf("%d",ans);
	return 0;
}

    â€‹ çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹:å¦‚æœa[i]==b[j],dp[i] [j]=dp[i-1] [j-1]+1,

    â€‹ å¦‚æœa[i]!=b[j],dp[i] [j]=max{dp[i-1] [j],dp[i] [j-1]}

    • æœ¬é¢˜ä¸­å…è®¸å…¬å…±éƒ¨åˆ†äº§ç”Ÿé‡å¤å…ƒç´ 

      çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º:

      å¦‚æœa[i]==b[j],dp[i] [j]=max{dp[i-1] [j],dp[i] [j-1]}+1

      å¦‚æœa[i]!=b[j],dp[i] [j]=max{dp[i-1] [j],dp[i] [j-1]}

    #include<cstdio> 
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=10010;
int a[maxn],b[maxn],dp[maxn][maxn];
int main(){
	int n,m,L;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	scanf("%d",&m);
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++) scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    scanf("%d",&L);
    for(int i=1;i<=L;i++) scanf("%d",&b[i]);
    for(int i=0;i<m;i++) dp[i][0]=0;//è¾¹ç•Œèµ·å§‹æ¡ä»¶
    for(int i=0;i<L;i++) dp[0][i]=0;//è¾¹ç•Œèµ·å§‹æ¡ä»¶
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){
    	for(int j=1;j<=L;j++){
    		int maxone=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);
    		if(a[i]==b[j]) dp[i][j]=maxone+1;                   
    		else dp[i][j]=maxone;
		}
	}
	printf("%d",dp[m][L]);
	return 0;
}

    çŠ¶æ€è½¬ç§»æ–¹ç¨‹: å¦‚æœs[i]==s[j],dp[i] [j]=dp[i+1] [j-1]

â€‹ è¾¹ç•Œï¼šdp[i] [i] =1;dp[i] [i+1]=(s[i]==s[i+1])? 1 : 0

#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=1010;
string str;
int dp[maxn][maxn];
int main(){
	memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
	getline(cin,str);
	int ans=1,len=str.length();
	for(int i=0;i<len;i++){//è¾¹ç•Œåˆå§‹åŒ–
		dp[i][i]=1;
		if(i<len-1){
			if(str[i]==str[i+1]){
				dp[i][i+1]=1;
				ans=2;//åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶æ³¨æ„æœ€é•¿å›æ–‡å­ä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦
			}
		}
	}
	for(int L=3;L<=len;L++){
		for(int i=0;i+L-1<len;i++){
			int j=i+L-1;
			if(str[i]==str[j]&&dp[i+1][j-1]==1){
				dp[i][j]=1;
				ans=L;
			}
		}
	}
	printf("%d",ans);
	return 0;
}

      dp[i] [v]=max{dp[i-1] [v],dp[i-1] [v-w[i]]+c[i]}(1<=i<=n, w[i]<=v<=V)

      #include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int maxn=10010;
const int maxv=110;
int dp[maxv]={0},w[maxn];
bool choice[maxn][maxv],flag[maxn];
bool cmp(int a,int b){
	return a>b;
}
int main(){
	int n,m;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&w[i]);
	}
	sort(w+1,w+1+n,cmp);
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
		for(int v=m;v>=w[i];v--){
			if(dp[v]<=dp[v-w[i]]+w[i]){
				dp[v]=dp[v-w[i]]+w[i];
				choice[i][v]=1;
			}else{
				choice[i][v]=0;
			}
		}
	}
	if(dp[m]!=m) printf("No Solution");
	else{
		int k=n,num=0,v=m;
		while(k>=0){
			if(choice[k][v]==1){
				flag[k]=true;
				v-=w[k];
				num++;
			}else flag[k]=false;
			k--;
		}
		for(int i=n;i>0;i--){
			if(flag[i]==true){
				printf("%d",w[i]);
				num--;
				if(num>0) printf(" ");
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

C[i]çš„è¦†ç›–é•¿åº¦æ˜¯lowbit(i),æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„çš„ä¸‹æ ‡å¿…é¡»ä»1å¼€å§‹

int getsum(int x)//è¿”å›å‰xä¸ªæ•´æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ{
   int sum=0;
   for(int i=x;i>0;i-=lowbit(i)){
      sum+=c[i];
   }

}

void update(int x,int v){

      c[i]+=v;
   }
}
